paragraph: 'Banda Carnaval' is a Mexican Latin Grammy nominated Banda from Mazatlán, Sinaloa, Mexico. The banda was named after “El Carnaval de Mazatlán” which is the biggest event that takes place every year in their hometown of Mazatlán. The Banda was formed by Jesús Tirado Castañeda in 2001.
2016: Corridos Y Rancheras En Vivo Desde Mazatlán, Sinaloa
